document.full_text: irving picard, the trustee, said that with a judge's approval he would make a first payout, of $272 million, to former madoff investors.
document.title: madoff trustee readies first payout for investors
lines_and_colors: irving picard, the trustee, said that with a judge's approval he would make a first payout, of $272 million, to former madoff investors.
